original_text: The sons of Amram; Aaron and Moses: and Aaron was separated, that he should sanctify the most holy things, he and his sons for ever, to burn incense before the Lord, to minister unto him, and to bless in his name for ever.
korean_text: 아므람의 아들들은 아론과 모세이니 아론은 그 자손들과 함께 구별되어 몸을 성결하게 하여 영원토록 심히 거룩한 자가 되어 여호와 앞에 분향하고 섬기며 영원토록 그 이름으로 축복하게 되었느니라

sentences.original_text: The sons of Amram were Aaron and Moses
that he should sanctify the most holy things
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 가장 거룩한 것들을 성별하게 하려함이라

sentences.original_text: he and his sons for ever
to burn incense before the Lord
and to bless in his name for ever
